alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone; Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 14 at 3:01AM MDT until June 15 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR FORT PECK LAKE... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a High Wind Warning, which is in effect from 6 AM to 9 PM MDT Wednesday. The High Wind Watch is no longer in effect. * TUESDAY WINDS...West at 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WEDNESDAY WINDS...West at 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * LAKE WIND TIMING...9 AM Tuesday morning to 6 AM Wednesday morning. * HIGH WIND TIMING...6 AM Wednesday morning to 9 PM Wednesday evening. * LAKE WIND IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions which could swamp or tip small craft. * HIGH WIND IMPACTS...These winds may blow down limbs, trees, and power lines. Expect difficult travel for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. Boaters should use extreme caution if venturing onto Fort Peck Lake. For your personal safety, avoid the open waters. Stay close to shore or around protected areas.
